# ignoredWords

**Instance Property**

Returns the words that the text checker ignores when spell-checking.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var ignoredWords: [String]? { get set }
```

## Return Value

An array of strings, each of which specifies a word the receiver ignores when it is spell-checking a document.

## Discussion

The spell checker excludes ignored words as misspelled words during the current spell-checking session only.

## Learning and Ignoring Words

- **ignoreWord(_:)**: Tells the text checker to ignore the specified word when spell-checking.
- **learnWord(_:)**: Tells the text checker to learn the specified word so that it doesn’t evaluate it as misspelled.
- **unlearnWord(_:)**: Tells the text checker to unlearn the specified word.
- **hasLearnedWord(_:)**: Returns whether the text checker has learned the specified word.
